name: 戴楠青
objective:
介紹高動態範圍數位影像之理論基礎與相關技術。在光環境模擬與視覺空間感知兩架構下，介紹高動態範圍數位影像技術在建築照明實務與空間感知研究的應用。
Introduce the theories and techniques of High Dynamic Range Imaging. Weekly seminars focus on its applications in architectural lighting, and research applications in space perception.
